text: Pooh's Heffalump Halloween Movie is a 2005 American direct-to-video animated movie. It was produced by John A. Smith and was directed by Elliot M. Bour and Saul Andrew Blinkoff. It is a sequel to Pooh's Heffalump Movie which was released in February 11, 2005. Pooh's Heffalump Halloween Movie was released on September 13, 2005 in North America. The movie is about Lumpy the Heffalump's adventure with his friends during his first Halloween with them. It is the first Winnie the Pooh movie since Paul Winchell's death and is the last movie to feature John Fiedler as the voice of Piglet, as Fielder died in 2005. == Cast == *David Ogden Stiers as The Narrator *Jimmy Bennett as Roo (Bennett replaces voice actor Nikita Hopkins) *Kyle Stanger as Lumpy the Heffalump *Peter Cullen as Eeyore *Jim Cummings as Winnie-the-Pooh and Tigger *John Fiedler as Piglet *Ken Sansom as Rabbit *Kath Soucie as Kanga *Frank Welker as Stitch the Pumpkin (cameo) Additional voices were provided by Travis Oates and Tara Strong. Oates also provided additional dialogue for Piglet since John Fiedler died in 2005, right before the movie was released. ==References== == Other websites == *Official website * Category:2005 movies Category:Disney animated movies Category:Disney direct-to-video movies Category:English-language movies Category:Direct-to-video movies Category:Halloween movies Category:Sequel movies
title: Pooh's Heffalump Halloween Movie
